description:
This course will help you get the knowledge you will need to get into the Film Industry where they film in Major Cities in the US. Learn where to look for jobs, how to dress, what to bring, how to get paid, what terms you will need to know and much more. By the end of the course you will you know where to look for jobs, how to get noticed and how NOT to pay for agents and fees that scammers take.

I have included websites to get you started in the Background Acting jobs. This course includes 5 Video Lectures showing websites as I read out loud the information you will need.

If you have always wanted to work on a Movie or Commercial this course is for you. Its helpful to get your foot in the door and gain some experience.

It should only take about 30mins to complete this course. And take notes.
title: Get into Background Acting in the USA
